text: Hello, how much do i have to pay to get access to the API?

<@U08ADN9HENT> A workflow has to be set up for a particular object type - contact, deal, company, etc. and then a trigger must be chosen to allow that object type to "enroll" in the workflow by meeting the trigger criteria.  You can't do that just by using the ID for the workflow, you must do whatever it takes to make the trigger fire.  Maybe I could help if I can understand what are you trying to accomplish?  Can you describe what you're trying to do?  There is a workflow api you can look at But I don't think that will do what you are asking.  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/api/automation/create-manage-workflows>

Hi, need a help. HubSpot account is configured with multiple Business unit options. However, when we try to capture the Business Unit value using HubSpot Deal Properties API, we get blank values as below :

Any idea how to capture this information via API?

Hey random HubSpot app dev question. We're running into <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Company-search-API-via-domain-is-not-returning-results/m-p/1080269|this issue>. In short, we look up a company record to log activities/associations. And if it doesn't exist we create a new one. But the lookup via API comes up empty so we end up creating a few duplicates. We trying to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/search?_gl=1*1tbmrqe*_ga*ODY4ODAyMDM3LjE3MzkyMDIwOTU.*_ga_LXTM6CQ0XK*MTczOTM1MzA3NC4yLjEuMTczOTM1MzA4NC41MC4wLjA.#limitations|follow these limitations> and built a 20s delay between calls but it still happens sometimes.

*How long are you all staggering API calls for situations like this?*

Hi, has anyone integrated HubSpot with PowerBi without third-party tools to view survey responses? I can already connect to contacts, deals and tickets, but I am interested in having survey response data
Hi good day! I need to generate a new client secret for my app, how can I do that?

Hi all!
I'd like to make a change to an existing HubSpot Form using the forms v3 API.
The PATCH request is returning an error:
```{
    "status": "error",
    "message": "The client is not allowlisted to perform an operation to v4 forms",
    "correlationId": "42d383f6-e897-4d09-851c-7aeacf01378e",
    "category": "BANNED"
}```
I believe that this is because the form is created using the "new editor" and that the API is not compatible at all.
Can someone confirm this? Thanks

Hello all, is there a way to call current progress to goal via the Goals API? I see there is only an hs_target_amount property, which is not helpful to my goal of building a KPI dashboard. Perhaps the Goals API doesn't have that property, so are there other places where I can find sales to date? Thanks!
